PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Conditions_Start: Start of the list of conditions that have a child node. Must be closed using Tale_Conditions_End.
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Conditions_End: End of the list of conditions that have a child node.
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_AllConditions_Start: Start of the list of all conditions. This includes the one that dont have a child. Must be closed using Tale_AllConditions_End.
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_AllConditions_End: End of the list of all conditions. This includes the one that dont have a child.
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Conditions_Else_Sta: Start of the content for the else part of the condition. This will only be rendered if the else part has a child. Must be closed using Tale_Conditions_Else_End.
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Conditions_Else_End: End of the content for the else part of the condition.
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Condition_Id: Id of the current condition. This will stay constant even if the order of the conditions is changed.
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Condition_IsFirst_S: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the current condition is the first one in the list. Must be closed using Tale_Condition_IsFirst_End.
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Condition_IsFirst_E: End of the content that will only be rendered if the current condition is the first one in the list.
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Condition_IsNotFirs: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the current condition is not the first one in the list. Must be closed using Tale_Condition_IsNotFirst_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the current condition is not the first one in the list.
